DOC.brief_title: Low Back Pain Depression : Cohort Study
DOC.detailed_description: 295 pregnant woman form cohort , pregnancy two month delivery . The Edinburgh Postnatal Depression Scale use evaluate depressive symptom 2 month postpartum . The LBP evaluate base self-administrated questionnaire , patient LBP classify lumbopelvic group accord mechanical assessment lumbar spine , pelvic pain provocation test , standard history , pain intensity visual analogue scale , spread pain pain drawing Oswestry index use evaluate disability . Logistics regression analysis perform explain predictor depression .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion pregnant 12 week 16 week , With expect normal pregnancy ( determined midwife ) , Being able understand read Spanish . Exclusion criterion end pregnancy gestational week 37 ( delivery abortion ) , Serious intellectual impairment , Having systemic disease ( spondylitis , infectious , vascular , metabolic endocrine relate process ) , rheumatic disease , fibromyalgia , lumbopelvic pain Verified diagnosis spinal problem previous 6 month , A history fracture , neoplasm previous spinal , pelvic femur surgery . Another exclusion criterion diagnosis depression anxiety previous year .
